text:
="preserve">HarbourFront Station (NE1/CC29) is an MRT Station in Singapore.
It is an interchange station along the North East MRT Line and Circle MRT Line. It is currently the only double terminus in Singapore's MRT line. The station is located next to VivoCity and HarbourFront Centre.
The station was originally called World Trade Center, but changed to its current name after the 11 attacks
Following Stations.
